name: Chakra Adept
enabledFormula: all(@feat:chakra_initiate,"Ability to awaken the heart chakra")

description.text: Your body and soul have grown more accustomed to kundalini energy.

sections.Benefit: Your pool of serpent-fire ki increases to 4 points. When you maintain your chakras as a swift action without opening a new chakra, you can choose to attempt either the Fortitude save or the Will save instead of both.
